intro: <0>Automatic Scanners<1>Automatic Scanners are Genshin tools that can automatically scan in-game data by manipulating your mouse movements, taking screenshots of the game, and then scanning information from those screenshots. These are low-risk tools that can help you automate a lot of manual process with scanning artifacts for GO. As any tools that indirectly interact with the game, althought their usage is virtually undetectable, <1>there could still be risk with using them. Users discretion is advised.<2>The most important aspect of using these Scanners with GO is the output format:<3><0><0>As of <1>v5.21.0, GO can import artifact data in the <3>mona-uranai format. <1>As of <1>v6.0.0, GO can import data in the <3>Genshin Open Object Description (GOOD) format.<4>Below are several scanners that have been tested with GO.<5>To upload the exported file, go to <1>Database page, and upload your file in the Database Upload section.
gis: <0>Genshin Impact Scanner</0><1>This light-weight app will scan all your characters + weapons + artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instrutions in the app to set it up. This scanner only scans in english. </1><2>The app exports to GOOD format by default.</2><3>Download link</3>
amenoma: <0>「天目」-- Amenoma</0><1>Scans all you artifacts in your inventory. Follow the instruction to capture the window and scan.</1><2>Has both Chinese and English version. (Download the <1>_EN.exe</1> version to scan in english)</2><3>Both the <1>mona-uranai</1> and <3>GOOD</3> format is accepted in GO. the <5>GOOD</5> format is recommended.</3><4>Download link</4><5>Please feel free to join their discord if you find any bugs. They are in need of more english testers.</5><6>Discord Invite</6>
cocogoat: <0>cocogoat</0><1>Originally Chinese scanner that was ported to English. Has an overlay to scan individual artifacts. </1><2>Cocogoat also retains your scanned artifacts, where you can edit them individually, and you can use them in its built-in mona-uranai optimizer.(Currently a Chinese-only optimizer)</2><3>It is recommended to export in its "Mona's Divination Shop" format.</3><4>Download link</4><5>WARNING: Do not use the "Genshin Optimizer" export format. importing it will delete your character & weapon data.</5>
